text: Casper a cocker spaniel of the Indian Army and Jaya, an Indian ‘chippiparai’ go about sniffing little boxes detecting urine samples for Covid-19 testing.They just sit next to the box indicating it's a positive case.#COVID19 #dogs #dogsoftwitter #CovidTesting #IndianArmy #vaccine https://t.co/5K6jbtHJu2
